title: When load model, it seems doesn't work right.
body_html:
I used to test model after training, it's test accuracy is about 0.68. Then i write a 'test.py' code, and i test the mode on the same test data, but the accuracy is about 0.12.
I load the model as follows:
featureModel = torch.load('model/ImageModel.pkl) featureModel.eval() captionmodel = torch.load('model/CaptionModel.pkl) captionmodel.eval()
What's wrong may it be?
body_text:
I used to test model after training, it's test accuracy is about 0.68. Then i write a 'test.py' code, and i test the mode on the same test data, but the accuracy is about 0.12.
I load the model as follows:
featureModel = torch.load('model/ImageModel.pkl) featureModel.eval() captionmodel = torch.load('model/CaptionModel.pkl) captionmodel.eval()
What's wrong may it be?
body:
I used to test model after training, it's test accuracy is about 0.68. Then i write a 'test.py' code, and i test the mode on the same test data, but the accuracy is about 0.12. 
I load the model as follows:
`featureModel = torch.load('model/ImageModel.pkl)
featureModel.eval()
captionmodel = torch.load('model/CaptionModel.pkl)
captionmodel.eval()`
What's wrong may it be?
